prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The document mentions a video recording of an online meeting that covers the most important information on this topic. However, the actual content of that video is not provided in the text.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: video recording, online meeting, important information
